title: HYDERABAD POLO AND RIDING CLUB - Management
text: HYDERABAD POLO AND RIDING CLUB - Management +91 – 9177 00 00 56 info@hprc.co.in Member Login Pay Now toggle navigation Home About us Who We Are Mission Vision Values Managing Committee Start Riding About Riding Packages Beginners Riding Programme Intermediate Riding Programme Advanced Riding Programme Polo Equestrian Polo About Polo Stick & Ball Chukkers Events Past Events Upcoming Events SPORTS CENTRE Tennis Badminton Squash Swimming pool Basketball Futsal Gym Sauna Upcoming SportS Event Packages Gold Package Platinum Package RESTAURANTS Chukkers Snaffles Bistro BANQUETS Membership Events & Media Photo Gallery Video Gallery News Events Newsletters Blogs Contact Us MANAGING COMMITTEE About Us MANAGING COMMITTEE Our COMMITTEE Read More Chaitania R Kumar Chaitania R Kumar is a serial entrepreneur and passionate polo enthusiast. He is the President for the club and looks after the vision, strategy and growth. He regularly contributes to interesting and unique ways to promote the Club and the sport of Polo at HPRC. He has been playing polo since 1990 and was part of the many winning teams, to name a few - the most prestigious Masters Cup Calcutta 2007. At a handicap of scratch, he is a very useful player for the team. He has more than one decade of experience on strategic consulting, business development and related activities. He has successfully facilitated numerous events in HPRC and has been conducting various Polo events across the globe. Chaitania is also a Partner at Inhabit, India’s top designer furniture store. Chaitania has bachelors of Science in Industrial Engineering from Purdue University, USA and completed his schooling from Hyderabad Public School. Dismiss Chaitania R Kumar President Read More Kunwar Sai Vijender Singh Kunwar Sai Vijender Singh Kunwar is a sports enthusiast, a martial art practitioner with BLACK BELT (AIKF) 2nd Dan, an animal lover, a horse owner, having nearly two decades of experience in horse riding and the game of Polo. As a Vice President of HPRC, Vijender Singh contributes significantly to HPRC consistent growth in various activities and associate satisfaction. He is the Promoter of Prakruthi Infrastructures & Developers. The company is into construction of Residential Villas & Apartments, Commercial Complexes etc. They have successfully completed several projects. Dismiss Kunwar Sai Vijender Singh Vice President Read More C. Sanjay Reddy C. Sanjay Reddy is actively involved with the day to day operations at HPRC. He is an industrialist having over 2 decades of leading experience in Pharmaceutical industry including setting up of manufacturing units, strategizing marketing activities and instrumental in managing the finance and business affairs of the Group. He is also associated with Real Estate activities and has interests in other businesses dealing in diverse activities. He is a chemical Engineer from Purdue University, Indiana, USA and Management degree from Columbia University, USA. Dismiss C. Sanjay Reddy Secretary Read More Rupesh Y Shah Rupesh Y Shah is the Treasurer and manages the funds at HPRC Dismiss Rupesh Y Shah Treasurer Read More Syed Ahmed Syed Ahmed, is the Joint Secretary at HPRC. Early life and education - Syed Ahmed (Shahbaz) completed his schooling in Hyderabad and Masters in Business Administration from Osmania University. As an Orator - He is an excellent orator and has been invited in several educational, corporate organisations, trained more than thousand teachers. As an Educationalist - He is the President of an educational Society and has been running schools for underprivileged children for the last 15 years and successfully produced a number of professionals in all sectors. Elected as the vice president of All India Ideal Teachers Association, Hyderabad District. As an Equestrian - He joined as an equestrian a little late at 33 but proved his mettle by winning several equestrian tournaments and finished as a Polo player. Serving after being elected as a Joint Secretary in HPRC to revive Polo in Hyderabad. He has completed his bachelors in MBA Finance, and is a successful leader, educationalist, entrepreneur and social change. He is a man with a mission to bring smiles on the faces of the deprived underprivileged children by helping them and imparting education. Dismiss Syed Ahmed Joint Secretary Read More Mr Sanjeev Kumar Agarwal Mr Sanjeev Kumar Agarwal is an avid enthusiast of the game of Polo and equestrian sport. He is an ambitious and seasoned first generation serial entrepreneur with success in founding, establishing and growing businesses across technology and infrastructure. Passion for investing in new businesses combined with a flair for technology resulting in entrepreneurial ventures leveraging both the interests. Founded and built SYSTEL INC from scratch to an employee base of 100 in less than two years; the current workforce is 350 strong and 13 million USD revenue. As the Managing Director for over 26 years, takes complete charge of all aspects of the business including Sales, HR, Accounting, Legal Networking and General Administration spearheading the vision and direction of the company with responsibility of expansion and quality of client service. Dismiss Mr Sanjeev Kumar Agarwal Executive Member Read More Mohammed Nayeem Uddin Mohammed Nayeem Uddin born and brought up in Hyderabad has a Masters degree in business administration and leading many companies and Super Hitech Developers is one of them. As a Sportsman His passion to play polo is unmatched. He is a thorough professional when it comes to playing the ‘sport of kings', which also is the 'king of sports’ POLO. He is well respected in the polo fraternity, locally, nationally and internationally. He has participated and won many national and international tournaments. Also plays extensively in Dubai and Australia. Nayeemuddin is a present serving Executive Member of Hyderabad Polo Riding Club. Social Changer & Philanthropist A man with vision, very compassionate, when it comes to rendering free education service and help to the most deserving and needy. The education institution he patronises in Balanagar, Bengaluru Highway achieved the unthinkable where the best top eight state ranks in TOSS (Telangana Open School Society) were secured by students belonging to institutions patronised by Nayeemuddin & Brothers in 2022-23. Dismiss Mohammed Nayeem Uddin Executive Member SUB-COMMITTEE EQUESTRIAN COMMITTEE MEMBERS Read More Chaitania R Kumar Chaitania R Kumar is a serial entrepreneur and passionate polo enthusiast. reason: The page contains detailed information about the management committee, including the president, vice president, secretary, treasurer, and joint secretary, along with their backgrounds, experiences, and roles, which is typical of an 'About Us' or 'About' page.
reasoning: This strategy is best for the 'About' page type with lengthy text content, as it allows for mapping of tokens (e.g., keywords, phrases) to specific paragraphs, enabling efficient retrieval of relevant information about the club's management, mission, and activities.
